events.message: I just received the smartwatch I ordered, but the screen has multiple scratches and it doesn't respond properly.
The customer has reported a product defect related to scratches and unresponsive screen on the smartwatch.
This case has been assigned to support agent Emily R. for follow-up and resolution.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your smartwatch arrived damaged. I'm here to help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and describe any other malfunctions you have noticed?
Here are some pictures showing the scratches and the screen unresponsiveness. The touchscreen barely reacts and some parts are dead.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement if possible. Thank you for the quick response and helpful options.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We have arranged for the defective item to be picked up at your convenience.
We are following up to ensure you have received your replacement smartwatch and that it is functioning properly. Please inform us if you encounter any further issues.
Since no issues have been reported, we will now close this case. Thank you for your cooperation, and enjoy your new smartwatch!
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to get your feedback on the support experience you had with us.
